H0.text: Who first hosted Family Feud. Richard Dawson

H1.text: Who first hosted Family Feud. Bob Barker

H2.text: Who first hosted Family Feud. Geoff Edwards

H3.text: Who first hosted Family Feud. Colin Emm

A4.text: Richard Dawson was selected as host of the original ABC and first syndicated versions of Family Feud.

A5.text: The original version of Family Feud aired from 1976 to 1985 with Richard Dawson as host.
